title: We all think in lists, make lists
description: We humans always had passion in collecting things of interests & organizing them in a meaningful way. Lists can collect stuff that we care about the most, and perhaps keep it separated from the noise.

title: Lists are Simple & Precise
description: Lists are the easiest way to express yourself. You dont need to care about forming sentences for the points you want to raise. The points you raise stay clear, and differentiable.

title: Lists are Fast Consumed
description: Lists can be effortlessly read & shared while on the go or when you simply dont have time... TL;DR

title: Lists are Social
description: Discussing and collaborating on lists with your friends is totally fun, or sometimes productive too.

title: Lists Last & Grow
description: Your lists are lively (like you) and evolve over time. They last long (forever!) after your tweets and wall posts are gone.
